# Lightning-fast

Open Source Search.  
No PhD required.

Craft delightful **search-as-you-type** experiences with Typesense.

Meticulously engineered  
for performance & ease of use.

[Start Building with  
**Typesense Open Source**](/docs/guide/)  
[Deploy on  
**Typesense Cloud**](https://cloud.typesense.org)

[![GitHub Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/typesense/typesense?style=social)](https://github.com/typesense/typesense)

## The Open Source Algolia Alternative

The Easier To Use Elasticsearch Alternative

[Algolia vs Elasticsearch vs Typesense vs Meilisearch](/typesense-vs-algolia-vs-elasticsearch-vs-meilisearch/) ‚Ä¢  
[Our Mission](/about/)

Search meets 2022.

Typesense is a modern, privacy-friendly, open source search engine built from the ground up using cutting-edge search algorithms, that take advantage of the latest advances in hardware capabilities.

[![typesense/typesense on GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/typesense/typesense?label=stars&style=for-the-badge&logo=github&color=020102)](https://github.com/typesense/typesense)

[![typesense/typesense on Docker Hub](https://img.shields.io/docker/pulls/typesense/typesense?label=pulls&style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&color=0db7ed&labelColor=020102)](https://hub.docker.com/r/typesense/typesense)

[![Typesense - Typo tolerant, delightfully simple, open source search üîç | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=123903&theme=dark)](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/typesense?utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-typesense)

[![Featured on Hacker News](https://hackerbadge.now.sh/api?id=22181437&type=dark)](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22181437)

## Features You Love, minus the Complexity

Neatly wrapped in an intuitive RESTful API

![](/_nuxt/img/typo_tolerance_icon.b53525c.svg)

### Typo Tolerance

Spellng Mistakes? Not a problem. Typesense automatically tries to correct typos.

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

### Tunable Ranking

Tailor your results to perfection via flexible and fast query-time sorting.

![](/_nuxt/img/result_pinning_icon.e02c7ab.svg)

### Result Pinning

Pin specific records in a particular position to feature or merchandize them.

![](/_nuxt/img/synonyms_icon.5a8de04.svg)

### Synonyms

Show results for pants when users search for trousers, or vice-versa, when you define them as synonyms.

![](/_nuxt/img/api_keys_icon.40b7ec1.svg)

### Multi-tenant API Keys

Store multiple users‚Äô data in a single index, create API keys for each user that restrict access to just their data.

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

### Dynamic Sorting

Sort records on the fly by any fields in your document. For eg: sort by price, sort by popularity, etc. No duplicate indices needed.

![](/_nuxt/img/grouping_icon.d2c9cef.svg)

### Grouping & Distinct

Provide more variety in your results by grouping results. Eg: combine all color variations of a shirt into a single result.

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

### Filtering & Faceting

Only fetch records that match a given filter. Aggregate field values and get counts, min, max and avg of values across records.

![](/_nuxt/img/geo_search_icon.c8dd81a.svg)

### Geo Search

Search & sort results within a certain distance from a latitude/longitude or within a polygon region.

![](/_nuxt/img/federated_search_icon.293d288.svg)

### Federated Search

Search one or more collections in a single query. Eg: search for both products and brands, given a single search query.

![](/_nuxt/img/high_availability_icon.66fe46b.svg)

### Easy High Availability

Build a resilient production-grade search service, with a few simple steps.

![](/_nuxt/img/easy_version_upgrades_icon.9bf5f18.svg)

### Easy Version Upgrades

Replace the binary, and restart the process. Typesense will automatically re-index your data in the new version.

## Batteries-Included Developer Experience

Zero to Instant-Search, in 30 seconds üöÄ

### 1. Run Typesense

Use Docker, our native binaries or our RPM or DEB packages.

Or, use [Typesense Cloud](https://cloud.typesense.org) to provision a cluster with a few clicks.

### 2. Index Data

Create a collection, then add some documents to it.

### And, That's It! Search away

You now have a typo-tolerant, search server you can send search queries to.

[**Try on Typesense Cloud**](https://cloud.typesense.org)

## API Libraries & Plugins in Your Favorite Languages

And if you don't find a library, reach out to us to collab on one

Compose Powerful Search & Discovery User Interfaces, quickly.
